alert.note: Alert for Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 1:32PM CDT until October 31 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Below freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Portions of Western El Paso County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Below freezing temperatures are mainly expected for Anthony, Vinton, Canutillo, and other more rural areas of western El Paso county. More urbanized areas of El Paso along the west slopes, around Mesa as an example, are more likely to stay just above freezing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
